title: 123 91 31 "The Crypt Script""That Looks Croc-ish! Luffy, Run to the Royal Tomb!"Transliteration: "Wanippoi! Ōke no haka e hashire Rufi!" (Japanese:ワニっぽい!王家の墓へ走れルフィ!) Junji Shimizu Michiru Shimada August 25, 2002(2002-08-25)[94] May 26, 2007[95][96]
transformers_text: 123 91 31 The Crypt Script That Looks C roc ish Luffy Run to the Royal Tomb Transliteration Wan ip poi ke no haka e has hire Ru fi Japanese Junji Shimizu Michiru Shimada August 25 2002 2002 08 25 94 May 26 2007 95 96 Crocodile joins Robin in the tomb and orders her to translate the Pone glyph Robin tells him that Pluto n was not mentioned and that it was only about history but Crocodile figures out that she was lying and stabs her in response When Luffy recovers from the last round of fighting he chases after Crocodile into the tomb
